page.title: 11WYBERTON PLAYING FIELD
page.content: WYBERTON PLAYING FIELD Wyberton playing field is set in a very good place as there are lots of houses around there.It is used for {Wyberton football teams}and many other sports like hockey and cricket also it is used for motor bike scrambling.Very often in hot weather it is used for picnics as there are picnic benches there.There are all kinds of things to play on like swings , slides , tyres , roundabout , horse , tunnel and a small fort to climb on.Many teenagers come and bring music to listen to while small children come to play. Small classes from schools go and play for the afternoon,also at dinner time{Wyberton School}children come for their dinners.
